title: Have you ever met Donald Trump? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America

response.answer_text: I met President Trump onceMemory is an elusive thingCirca 2003–2005In Midtown ManhattanMy brain categorized it with 3 other politicians /political figures, I met around the same timeSenator Bob & Elizabeth Dole, Mayor Rudy Giluliani, and Archbishop Desmond TutuI shook hands with all of the people in #3. I remember telling Elizabeth Dole, it's an honor to meet an American hero- her husband. She was very gracious and they were very good looking…Mayor Giluluani gave me a firm handshake but his eyes were vacant. Almost looking through me… no usual politician gladhandiing, faux charmArchbishop Tutu I remember very little except, everything out of his mouth was how George W. Bush was Lucifer or something like thatSo… what the fuck does this have to do w me meeting President Trump, you ask my 2 readers? haha…. Well- channeling President Reagan haha—- one of those times in #6, I met President Trump.It was in midtown manhattan, between 42nd & 59th street. Unsure east or west sideLasted less than 1 minute… maybe 45 seconds…He didn't shake my hand. But did acknowledge and nod. And said a few generic small talk phrases. Had a smile on his face…And seems like- the vibe I got- was that he was a cool guy… but anyhoo that's all I remember.Can't tell you more 'cause I told you already… w apologies to Billy Joel haha

Passed him in the hall at 725 Fifth Avenue on my way to help the Apprentice production crew (at the top of that UGLY escalator that he came down to announce his candidacy). I very obviously ignored him because I know a lot of folks in the construction industry in NYC and have absolutely nothing to say to the “man”. I watched his reflection as I passed him and he was obviously frowning at the fact that someone can walk right by the guy whose name is on the side of the building and not be star struck. Sorry, DJ Trump. I worked at MTV and met LOTS of celebrities. I don’t do star struck… and the only way you’re a star is by the dictionary definition - a big, exploding, flaming ball of gas.

No I havent and I am problably not good looking enough or I am just to old to be in his presence.I am not in my 30’s Plus i am not a forigner. Lol just kidding. No I have never met him. Or plan on meeting him.

I don’t think so and most likely won’t. I know i’ve been hailed as some kind of Trump-whisperer on here but not even I can figure out the orange creature, there are just some things my powers cannot do.
